trading_floor: is the e-commerce website of Dayton Pharma Joint Stock Company.
content: Customers need to purchase products on the website must meet the following conditions:
content_1: Business establishments affiliated to establishments having the function of medical examination and treatment.
content_2: Must have a certificate of eligibility for pharmaceutical business.
content_3: Must do business at the registered location in the business registration license.
content_4: Register as a member and get verified by MEDOFA
content_5: Individual and institutional customers who are not eligible for pharmaceutical business are not supported on this website.
message: You must agree to the terms in order to access the website
